sourcesContent:
<template>
   <ag-charts-vue :options="options"></ag-charts-vue>
</template>

<script>
import { AgChartsVue } from 'ag-charts-vue3';
import { mapGetters } from 'vuex';
export default {

  components: {
    'ag-charts-vue': AgChartsVue,
  },
  data: function () {
    return {
      options: null,
      event: {

      }
    };
  },

  methods: {
    createChart() {
      this.options = {
      data: [
      { label: 'За', value: this.event.voteFor },
      { label: 'Против', value: this.event.voteAgainst },
      ],
      series: [
        {
          type: 'pie',
          angleKey: 'value',
          calloutLabelKey: 'label',
          sectorLabelKey: 'value',
          sectorLabel: {
            color: 'white',
            fontWeight: 'bold',
          },
        },
      ],
    };
    },

    getEvent() {
      this.event = this.EVENTS[this.$route.params['id']-1]
    }
  },

  created() {
    this.createChart()

  },

  mounted() {
    this.getEvent()
    this.createChart()
  },

  computed: {
   ...mapGetters([
     'EVENTS',
   ]),
 },
}
</script>

<style>

</style>
